About

Dr. Ayon Borthakur

Assistant Professor
Dept. of Artificial Intelligence
IIT Hyderabad

  • (2021–22) Senior Neuromorphic Engineer,
    Innatera Nanosystems, The Netherlands
  • (2021) Ph.D., Artifcial Intelligence ( Computational Biology ),
    Cornell University, USA,
    Thesis Committee– Thomas Cleland ( Chair ), Thorsten Joachims, David Field, Alyosha Molnar, David Smith
  • (2013–14) Research Assistant, Center for Neuroscience,
    IISc Bengaluru ( with Supratim Ray )
  • (2013) B.Tech, Electrical Engineering, IIT Dhanbad

Grants

  • Intel Neuromorphic Community faculty grant for Ayon Borthakur's PhD research ( 2018 ).
  • Cornell University conference travel grant ( 2014, 2016, 2017, 2019 )
  • Cornell University Sage fellowship ( 2014 )
